headline: Truist Raises L3Harris Technologies’ (LHX) Price Target to $353, Maintains Buy Rating
summary: L3Harris Technologies Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is one of the best defense stocks in Goldman Sachs’ portfolio. On October 15, Truist Securities raised its price target on L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) to $353 from $302, while maintaining a Buy rating ahead of the sector’s third-quarter earnings season. The firm notes that the demand environment and broader sentiment for the […]

headline: How Investors May Respond To Bombardier (TSX:BBD.B) Landing Key Role in Korean Defense Contract Expansion
summary: Earlier this month, L3Harris Technologies announced a partnership with Bombardier and other industry leaders to deliver modified Bombardier Global 6500 aircraft as part of a US$2.26 billion airborne early warning and control program for the Republic of Korea Air Force; this coincided with Bombardier securing significant new business jet orders, expanding its support network in the U.S., and advancing partnerships for specialized mission aircraft and aftermarket services. These developments...
